title: Brand New Architect Designed House for Sale
details:
Brand New architect designed house for sale situated in a highly residential area, Maharagama
- Living Area
- Dining Area
- Wet Kitchen
- Wooden floor
- 4 Pantries
- 4 Bedrooms
- 4 attached bathrooms
- Double car porch
- Servant room and toilet
- CCTV installed
- Roof terrace
